js:
var url = MY_URL.replace("hiker://empty##", "").replace("all", getMyVar("fyclass"))
var json = JSON.parse(request(url)).data
d = json.map(data => ({
    title: data.nickName,
    desc: data.platform.replace('huya', 'è™ç‰™').replace('douyu', 'æ–—é±¼').replace('cc', 'ç½‘æ˜“CC').replace("bilibili", "å“”å“©å“”å“©"),
    img: (data.headPic.startsWith('/') ? 'https:' + data.headPic : data.headPic) + '@Referer=',
    content: data.isLive == '0' ? 'æœªå¼€æ’­' : 'ç›´æ’­ä¸­',
    url: "hiker://page/detail?#immersiveTheme#&roomid=" + data.roomId + "&platform=" + data.platform
}))
setResult(d)
